documents.document: @bchydro @xnt Yes, we are. Ok, thanks for the info, I didnâ€™t see that on the website for some reason. Hopefully itâ€™s only two hours this time.

@xnt @bchydro Same here. Last time at least our elevators were working from the backup generator. Weâ€™re a bit nervous because my wife is 9 months pregnant and we live 18 stories up. No info on @bchydroâ€™s site yet.
RT @GlennKesslerWP: Other awards created by presidents: President's Volunteer Service Award (GW Bush) Malcolm Baldrige National Quality Awaâ€¦
@xnt @bchydro Hey @xnt is power out in your building again? We seem to have lost ours again.
@Bill_McCreery @JenStDen @TomDavidoff I'm sure there are. Doesn't mean we shouldn't also build more THs in Vancouver. It's not an either-or situation. Address demand and supply.
@JenStDen @TomDavidoff Calming demand is great. But we also need more supply, including new forms of housing. Not everyone wants a condo or a house. #MissingMiddle

@MikeKlassen Fair enough. Just struck me the wrong way when the TV guide listed "Remembrance Day" on Global and CTV, next to "Arthur" on CBC
